data.message: How do I unfollow Donald Trump? Why am I receiving his pornographic (at least to me) and offensive ads? Hide ad does NOT work. If FB is going to force users to look at this trashy content, one should be able to delete or block ads from specific sources.  Bad enough that whining advertisers have essentially made adblock useless.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Amy. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2b7kaDQ. -Jessica

Facebook That link doesn't work. How do I block these ads for good: https://secure.donaldjtrump.com/djtsvic-goldtrumpcard-49?amount=100&utm_campaign=42598-KW134-NFD-LP54-Copy177_s_donor_postvideo_national_donor_XX_facebook&utm_medium=ad&utm_source=s_facebook_postvideo&utm_content=s_Sprinklr_RNC_Test_VD2C_Copy177_oCPMypur_US_AllGeos_B_27_65_KW134_NFD_LP54_Trump_NOEXC&utm_term=s_CambridgeAudiences_ocpmr

Facebook una pregunta..porque si pulican los periodicos o alguna pagina 
Lo que dice Donald Trump.. que odia a los negros a los Mexicanos ..alienta a la gente que tenga armas a ir a matar a Hillary Clinton ...claramente dice maten a esa mujer !!!! Ustedes no bloquean esos comentarios de ese hombre Trump???
Y si uno pone algo sobre ese idiota ..entonces si eliminan nuestros comentarios por incumplir la ley de facebook ??????????????? No me queda clara la diferencia ..de porque el si puede y uno que no tiene los billones como el...no podemos  atacar a ese hombre mal nacido racista y agresivo Trump ??????
Aye, this and promoted clickbait spam. It's not even real stuff thats promoted anymore, just clickbait. Ughhhhh.
